channel.title: Some modifications:
channel.description:
1when i go to lunar spells for teleports its telling me the wrong thing like it will say PVP zone but when i click it it pops up some mini games that i can go to, and same for the others which file what part of code do i change? 2when i try to attack corp or torm demons it doesnt let me. i'm sure its just a line or two of code. 3the portals that teleport you to a place those are wrong can i change those names at all? 4. where can i change the status of a NPC such as barrelchest guy. i want to delete one of them and make him a little bigger, stronger, with more hp (a boss) 5. Shops: where can i go and what do i change the stock in the store, whats in the store, and moving the shop itself.
i'll rep++ who can help with these. please and thanks :)

item.title: Some modifications:
item.dc:creator: @Brandontan Brandontan
item.description:
@Brandontan wrote:

[quote=“mr pker01, post:5, topic:405453”]Change shops at Source > Data > Shops.cfg
Change NPC status into stronger, weaker or etc at Source > Data > Npc.cfg
Change NPC Location at Source > Data > Spawn-config.cfg
Change Teleport buttons on ur telebook at Source > Src > Model > Players > Packets > Clickingbuttons.java [Just search it there]
Also the portals are in clickingbuttons.java[/quote]
Thanks this helps loads. i’m fixing stuff now, and i dont want to make an entirely new npc just want to make one stronger. and delete another one. like there is only two spawns of them and i want to delete one spawn. the make him bigger. and then make him hp++ and all that stuff lol (barrelchest guy)

Read full topic

item.title: Some modifications:
item.dc:creator: @mr_pker01 mr pker01
item.description:
@mr_pker01 wrote:

Change shops at Source > Data > Shops.cfg
Change NPC status into stronger, weaker or etc at Source > Data > Npc.cfg
Change NPC Location at Source > Data > Spawn-config.cfg
Change Teleport buttons on ur telebook at Source > Src > Model > Players > Packets > Clickingbuttons.java [Just search it there]
Also the portals are in clickingbuttons.java

Read full topic
